name: Amok
description:
Hating is easy as does with laughing, but a sacrifice are needed to become kind. But how if people using our kindness and spot it as a weakness?. This artwork is to remember that these days there are several justice case that happened to woman in Indonesia.

one, There is a wife whom angry to a husband's drunk habit behaviour has to explain the cronologies at the police officer, ikr, why thooo?? we supposed to be angry if our husband cant control their drinking habit. 

two, there is a woman who suffer from mental illness because she is feeling lonely after pregnant from the rape case. She is so sad and she drank cyanide poison at her father's graveyard. That is soo sad!!. 

So woman, be angry is okay, speak up our right is the one that we should do, it's a must especially when our rights has been taken, a lot. 

let's be strong together.
